DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of the study was to evaluate the safety and efficacy of biphasic insulin aspart 30 (NovoMixÂ® 30) when switching to a modern premix insulin analogue treatment compared to previous insulin regimen in routine clinical practice in the Slovak Republic.
DOC.brief_title: Physiological Concept of Insulin Therapy in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
